name: Standard bar; music and dancing available
text: §281-47  Standard bar; music and dancing available.  Any standard bar establishment may provide facilities for dancing by patrons, including a dance floor and live or recorded music, if the establishment is located in a commercial district and obtains the approval of the commission to provide such services on a one time trial basis not to exceed ninety days; provided that the music and dancing shall be allowed only during the trial period. [L 1983, c 292, §2; am L 1984, c 269, §3]
